PageTitle: display bgp l2vpn-ad routing-table vpls statistics
FuncDef: The display bgp l2vpn-ad routing-table vpls statistics command displays statistics information about VPLS routes in the L2VPN-AD address family.
CLIs: display bgp l2vpn-ad routing-table vpls statistics
Examples: <HUAWEI> display bgp l2vpn-ad routing-table vpls statistics
Total number of routes from all PE: 5
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view statistics information about VPLS routes in the L2VPN-AD address family, run the display bgp l2vpn-ad routing-table vpls statistics command.
